name: Crowd Mastery
summary: You use the crowd to your advantage, diverting your foes’ attention to potential hidden dangers in the crowd.
description:
You use the crowd to your advantage, diverting your foes’ attention to potential hidden dangers in the crowd. When determining if your foe is flanked, treat all squares occupied by a crowd as if they were occupied by an ally with a melee reach of 5 feet.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
